message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its high quality and unique features, I am proposing an initial price of $20000. This reflects not only the value of the product itself but also the potential return on investment for your company. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the quality of your product, $20000 is a bit steep for my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value and benefits of our product, I propose a price of $15000. This still reflects the true value of the product while being more accessible to your current budget. Please let me know if this revised price meets your requirements.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $15000 is still above my limit.  I'm happy to meet in the middle at $12500.  This is my final offer, as I'm ready to purchase from John if we can't come to an agreement.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. After considering your offer, I am willing to accept $13750 as the price for our product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions. I hope this aligns with your budget considerations, and we can move forward with the transaction.
